page.title: 01OUR DOMESDAY AREA
page.content: The area we are covering is {Bebington/Bromborough/Poulton}on the Wirral peninsula.The area is convenient for communications with the rest of Britain:it has many motorways, railway lines and other routes.66% of the area is built upon whilst the rest is woods,fields etc.There is an industrial works in {Port Sunlight}which was built by{Lever {Brothers}and includes one of the first housing estates in the country.The factory makes things such as soaps,washing_up liquids and deodorants.We have two Secondary Schools, one for each sex,and two Grammar Schools, one for each sex. There are five Primary Schools. There is a hospital but it does not have accident or emergency facilities.There are many public facilities particularly for sport.
